replies.author: Mithey
replies.txt_content: 。1.7版本有些冲突吧，换回旧版本

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
rpgitem4.09版本不明确
推荐使用Rpgitem3.5
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-546850-1-1.html
